ComicInfo.Summary: Hulk Fiction: Betty struggles to write her book about life with the Hulk. Rick prepares to launch his new talk show. Matt Talbot is brought to task for shooting Betty. Omnibus is judged by his people. She-Hulk is talking to Samson on the phone when he is attacked by shadows.
ComicInfo.Tags: Betty Ross,Hulk,Washington D.C.,Omnibus,Los Angeles,Matt Talbot,Marlo Chandler-Jones,Rick Jones,Hotshot,She-Hulk,Leader,Canada,Florida,Doc Samson,Henry Gyrich
